dmca.title: Xandari Requests Google Take Down Cloned Website
dmca.body:
XANDARI RESORT

7 MARCH 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, Image Search Service Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
Fax to: [Private], Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints

To Whom It May concern: RE: COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT [Private]

The following URL is using our copyrighted reservation form and cloning our entire website. This is a matter of credit card security and trust (sic) that this matter will be immediately handled!

www15.secure-website.net/~buenpas/xandari/xandarireservations.html

Their contact email address is:

[Private]

In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, we ask that you make a good-faith attempt to contact the owner or administrator of each affected site so that they may make a counter notification pursuant to sections 512(g)(2) and (3) of that Act.

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Thank you,

[Private] for
[Private] - Owner - Xandari Resort and Spa Village
www.xandari.com

COPYRIGHT NOTIFICATION:

Copyright (C)2003 Xandari Resort & Spa. All rights reserved.

The Xandari Resort and Spa website and all it's (sic) contents are protected under US and International copyright laws. No portion of this site may be copied and/or reproduced without written permission from Xandari Resort and Spa.

Xandari Resort and Spa - Costa Rica
[Private] Summerland - California 93067
Tel: [Private] Fax: [Private] Xandari Resort and Spa - Costa Rica

XANDARI RESORT AND SPA

From: [Private]
Sent: Thursday, March 06, 2003 5:29 PM
To: XANDARI RESORT AND SPA
Subject: Re: COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT [Private]

Hi-

We were able to locate the second link within our search results. Due to the legal nature of this document, it is important that the information is accurate in the complaint before processing.

Please resubmit a revised complaint only including the following link:

www15.secure-website.net/~buenpas/xandari/xandarireservations.html

We appreciate your patience and await your revised complaint.

Regards,
The Google Team

Original Message Follows

From: "XANDARI RESORT AND SPA
